trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest" /> instance for which to select an authentication scheme.
trans-unit.target: 要選取驗證配置的 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Selects the authentication scheme for an <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 選取 <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpListener" /> 執行個體的驗證配置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes" /> values that indicates the method of authentication to use for the specified client request.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes" /> 值，指出要用於指定用戶端要求的驗證方法。

trans-unit.source: Delegates of this type are used by <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> instances to select an authentication scheme based on the characteristics of a request.
trans-unit.target: 此類型的委派由<xref:System.Net.HttpListener>選取一種驗證配置的執行個體根據要求的特性。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemeSelector> delegate is passed an <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest> object for each incoming request that has not provided authentication information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemeSelector>會傳遞給委派<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest>尚未提供驗證資訊的每個連入要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: The method invoked by the delegate uses the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest> object and any other available information to decide which authentication scheme to require.
trans-unit.target: 委派叫用此方法會使用<xref:System.Net.HttpListenerRequest>物件與任何其他可用的資訊來決定需要哪種驗證配置。

trans-unit.source: The delegate is specified by using the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate%2A> property.
The following example uses an instance of this type to set the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用此類型的執行個體設定<xref:System.Net.HttpListener.AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the implementation of the method invoked by the <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemeSelector> delegate in the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示叫用之方法的實作<xref:System.Net.AuthenticationSchemeSelector>委派在上述範例中。
